text: Bachia cacerensis is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Bachia Category:Reptiles described in 1998 Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Taxa named by Maria Ignêz Castrillon Category:Taxa named by Christine Strüssman {{lizard-stub}
title: Bachia cacerensis
